title: Jefferson and Hamilton economic policy - compare

content.question: Thomas Jefferson disagreed with Alexander Hamiltonâ€™s economic plan primarily because he feared that it would

choices.label: make the new nation dependent on foreign markets for its exports
prevent the expansion of slavery to new states
lead to a military alliance with Great Britain against revolutionary France
lead to heavy taxes on whiskey producers in Pennsylvania
promote urban mercantile interests at the expense of agricultural interests

content.answer: promote urban mercantile interests at the expense of agricultural interests

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
